thread.title: Boxer Quigg swapping Holcombe Hill for Hollywood | Granada
thread.title_full: Boxer Quigg swapping Holcombe Hill for Hollywood | Granada - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Boxer Quigg swapping Holcombe Hill for Hollywood | Granada
text:
Boxer Scott Quigg is packing his backs and heading to LA, for a shot at boxing glory with one of the sport's greatest trainers.
Scott Quigg packs his bags Credit: Mike Hall/ITV Granada The Bury boy will fight under the great Freddie Roach, who trains Manny Pacquiao.
But Scott has to leave behind his biggest fan, his mum.
Mike Hall
Play video Last updated Thu 23 Feb 2017 Sport
